## Passkey-First Authentication

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="🔐 Passwordless Authentication">
    With our passwordless authentication system, we handle the authentication of your users seamlessly, ensuring a secure and hassle-free experience.<br /> Use our [Developer Panel](https://app.corbado.com/signin#signup-init) to customize the authentication [user flow](/overview/configuration/user-flow-configuration) for your application.
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="🔮 Passkey-Intelligence">
    With Passkey-Intelligence, we simplify passkey management to offer a personalized and smooth authentication experience for every user.
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="✨ UI Components">
    With Corbado [UI Components](/frontend-integration/ui-components), developers can easily integrate **pre-built**, **visually appealing**, and **customizable** UI elements in minutes, ensuring a fast implementation process and delivering a delightful user experience.
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>

    Find all information you need about passkeys.

   Find here the Corbado API specifications.
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

  We want to provide the best developer experience possible. If you have any
  questions or feedback, please just drop us a message
  via [contact@corbado.com](mailto:contact@corbado.com) or join our [Slack](https://bit.ly/passkeys-community) community.
</Note>

## Corbado Complete vs. Corbado Connect

Corbado provides solutions for integrating passkeys into **new** and already **existing apps**.

| 🛡️ Corbado Complete for new apps                                                                       | 🧩 Corbado Connect for existing apps                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Rapid Authentication:** Get authentication done in 1 sprint with a standalone solution.              | **Enhanced Customer Engagement:** Boost conversions and seamlessly integrate with existing keychains. |
| **Password-Free Experience:** Eliminate password hassles and prevent customer drop-offs.               | **Seamless Integration:** No migration needed; retain user data and authentication system.              |
| **Adopt Industry Standards:** Follow the lead of tech giants like Google for a cutting-edge solution.         | **Risk-Free Transition:** Continue using passwords without any disruption.                             |
| _Secure Cloud Storage:_ Store user data securely in Corbado Cloud.                                      | _Flexible Deployment:_ Maintain control over user data with deployment in your own environment.        |
| [**Get Started with Corbado Complete**](/products/corbado-complete)                                      | [**Explore Corbado Connect**](/products/corbado-connect)                                             |
